select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from partner
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:

update partner set gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alipay_account = #{alipayAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, taobao_user_id = #{taobaoUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, taobao_nick = #{taobaoNick,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, iden_num = #{idenNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business_type = #{businessType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, solid_point = #{solidPoint,jdbcType=CHAR}, lease_area = #{leaseArea,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, alilang_user_id = #{alilangUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, flower_name = #{flowerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select b.name, b.taobao_user_id as userid, a.type as role from partner_station_rel a, partner b,station c where a.station_id=c.id and a.partner_id=b.id and a.state in('SERVICING','CLOSED','CLOSING','DECORATING','QUITING') and c.status in('CLOSED','SERVICING','DECORATING','CLOSING','QUITING','NEW','TO_AUDIT','TO_LOGISTICS_AUDIT') and c.state='NORMAL' and b.state='NORMAL' and a.type is not null and a.is_deleted='n' and b.is_deleted='n' and c.is_deleted='n'
